= Introduction =

MapMe basically displays 2D maps on Google Android but also adds additional features.


= Details =

These extra features are:
  * Interaction with Android GPS device (track GPS position, saves routes, etc)
  * Storage of location bookmarks/navpoints (including search capabilities) via <a href="http://www.db4o.com">db4o</a>
  * A system for allowing you friends to watch your location and viceversa

and more!
